column4: What is that clicking sound that comes on when the log-in window starts up?
A window popped up saying that GDM_failsafe is the default.
Should I make GNOME the default?
Still nothing!
grrr!
ok! thanks for all your help mycket
hey all :)
Noob to 'nix here....
I was wondering if someone could answer a couple quick questions for me?
Anybody using Wine currently?
well, yes
Have you had any success using it with any recently released software?
no it only works with quite a limitid number of programs. they have a compatibility list on their website
most recent program I ran with wine was IE because I needed it for my web bank
I know, I was just browsing it. I'm a web developer who's addicted to Dreamweaver....
Oh
I use an iMac at home, but I need something for my laptop which is running Kubuntu...
I don't think it works with wine. check frankscorner.org too, though
What's frankscorner?
frankscorner.org is a web page with instructions for installing different programs in wine
ok, cool. Thanks mwe
One more question for you: I'm also browsing KDE-Apps.org for some web development tools. Anyone you could suggest?
